title: Sheitan's Tango
description: The adventures of Special Undercover Agent Jon X (Jon Ten) continue in this action fiction novel SHEITAN'S TANGO. Agent Jon X, an employee of the Secret Spy Agency (SSA), lives by the American Creed..."I therefore believe it is my duty to my country to love it, to support its Constitution, to obey its laws, to respect its flag, and to defend it against all enemies.‚Äù
author: Morris George
